settings.question: How much is shipping?
settings.answer:
Shipping is $7 for ground service, $11 for 2-day delivery, and we offer FREE shipping for orders that include two crib sheets or more. 

We encourage you to purchase sheets for friends and family as there is no better gift than sleep!

settings.question: How do I return/exchange?
settings.answer:
Products that are unwashed and in their original packaging are eligible for return within 30 days of delivery.


To begin a return or exchange, please email sleep@petitsleep.com. We will provide you with a prepaid return label and ensure your return is processed ASAP.

Please allow up to 2 weeks for processing once your return is received and quality checked at our warehouse.

 Once your return is processed you will receive an email confirmation to the email address provided at the time of purchase.

settings.question: There’s something wrong with my order, what should I do?
settings.answer: Please contact us ASAP, and we will be sure to fix the problem ASAP.
